Toyota.Name: Toyota MR2 W20
Toyota.global_information: The engine is located in the middle of the car, behind the driver's seat, providing excellent weight balance and improved handling. It delivers a characteristic sporty driving feel, perfectly complemented by the mid-engine configuration. Often features pop-up headlights (depending on the version), a sturdy coupe or T-top (removable roof) styling, and a smoother appearance compared to the first generation.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Hilux Double Cab
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Hilux Double Cab is known for its durability and off-road capability. It features a robust 3.0L I6 hybrid engine, providing a balance of power and efficiency. The vehicle is equipped with a 6-Speed Manual transmission, making it suitable for various driving conditions. Its spacious interior accommodates five passengers comfortably, making it a practical choice for both work and leisure

Toyota.Name: Toyota Century Royal
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Century Royal is a luxury sedan known for its elegant design and powerful 5.0L V12 gasoline engine. It features a smooth 6-Speed Automatic transmission and delivers 423 hp. The vehicle comfortably seats five passengers and is often associated with high status and prestige.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Hilux
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Hilux is a reliable and versatile pickup truck known for its durability and off-road capabilities. It features a range of diesel engines, including 2.6L and 2.8L options, paired with a 6-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers seating for four passengers and is popular for both work and recreational use.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Land Cruiser 2022
Toyota.global_information: The 2022 Toyota Land Cruiser is a full-size SUV known for its off-road capabilities and luxurious features. It is powered by a robust 3.5L V6 twin-turbo gasoline engine that delivers 409 hp, paired with a smooth 10-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers spacious seating for up to seven passengers, making it ideal for both family adventures and rugged terrains.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Land Cruiser 2025
Toyota.global_information: The 2025 Toyota Land Cruiser is a full-size SUV known for its off-road capabilities and luxurious features. It is powered by a robust 3.5L V6 twin-turbo gasoline engine that delivers 409 hp, paired with a smooth 10-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers spacious seating for up to seven passengers, making it ideal for both family adventures and rugged terrains.

Toyota.Name: Toyota AE86 Black Limited
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota AE86 Black Limited is a high-performance sports car known for its sleek design and powerful engine. It features a 2.0L inline-six gasoline engine that delivers 170 hp, paired with a 6-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers seating for four passengers and is celebrated for its agility, speed, and driving dynamics.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Auris Wagon
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Auris Wagon is a high-performance sports car known for its sleek design and powerful engine. It features a 1.8L VVT-i hybrid engine that delivers 200 hp, paired with an 8-Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle offers seating for four passengers and is celebrated for its agility, speed, and driving dynamics.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Camry 2020
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Camry is a reliable midsize sedan renowned for its comfort, fuel efficiency, and hybrid technology. It features a 2.5L hybrid engine delivering smooth performance and excellent economy, making it a top choice for families and daily commuters.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Celica Turbo IMSA GTO
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Celica Turbo IMSA GTO is a legendary race car from the IMSA GTO series, developed by All-American Racers. With a powerful turbocharged engine and aggressive aero, it dominated the championship in the late 1980s with raw speed and handling.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Corolla Levin AE92 GT Apex
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Corolla Levin AE92 GT Apex is a classic JDM sports coupe known for its nimble handling and rev-happy 4A-GE engine. It offers exciting front-wheel-drive performance for enthusiasts seeking a lightweight, fun-to-drive car.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Fortuner 2021
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Fortuner 2021 is a rugged body-on-frame SUV built for adventure and family use. With a powerful turbo diesel engine, optional 4x4, and spacious 7-seater layout, it's popular for its durability and off-road capability.

Toyota.Name: Toyota FT1 Vision GT
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota FT1 Vision GT is a stunning concept created for Gran Turismo, featuring aggressive styling and race-inspired aerodynamics. It represents Toyota's vision of a future high-performance sports car with breathtaking design and speed.

Toyota.Name: Toyota GR Supra GT300
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota GR Supra GT300 is a Super GT race car with a powerful V8 engine and advanced aerodynamics. It delivers thrilling performance in the GT300 class, combining Supra heritage with racing precision.

Toyota.Name: Toyota GR Supra
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota GR Supra is a modern sports coupe with BMW-derived engineering and a potent turbo inline-6 engine. It offers razor-sharp handling, explosive acceleration, and iconic design for pure driving enthusiasts.

Toyota.Name: Toyota GR Yaris Rally WRC
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota GR Yaris Rally WRC is a World Rally Championship contender with all-wheel drive and a high-revving turbo engine. It brings rally-bred performance and agility to extreme conditions.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Hilux Revo Prerunner 2021
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Hilux Revo Prerunner 2021 is a tough, off-road-oriented pickup with enhanced suspension and powerful diesel engine. It's built for durability, high-speed desert running, and heavy-duty work.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra GT500
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra GT500 is a top-tier Super GT race car with extreme power and downforce. It dominates the GT500 class with cutting-edge technology and blistering speed.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra MK IV 1994
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra MK IV 1994 is an iconic JDM legend with the legendary 2JZ-GTE engine. Known for massive tuning potential, it offers incredible performance and timeless design.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra MK4 A80
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra MK4 A80 is the ultimate fourth-generation Supra, famous worldwide for its robust 2JZ engine and tuning culture. It's a true performance icon with balanced handling and raw power.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Supra
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Supra (A90) revives the legendary nameplate with modern engineering, delivering thrilling dynamics, turbocharged power, and sharp styling for a new generation of sports car fans.

Toyota.Name: Toyota TS030 Hybrid
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota TS030 Hybrid is a Le Mans prototype with hybrid technology combining a powerful V8 and electric motors. It competed fiercely in endurance racing with innovative efficiency and speed.

Toyota.Name: Toyota Van 1982
Toyota.global_information: The Toyota Van 1982 is a classic rear-wheel-drive minivan from the 80s, offering practical space and reliability for families. It was Toyota's early entry into the people-mover market with simple, durable design.
